scripts.image-to-ring: npm run image-to-heightmap && npm run heightmap-to-ring
scripts.heightmap-to-ring: echo Generating model, please wait until you see "Finished!" in the console. It can take quite a while... && "C://Program Files/OpenSCAD/openscad" -o output.stl heightmapToRing.scad && echo Finished! See output.stl for results.
